name: Antigravity Agent
description: AI-powered automation agent for infrastructure management, CI/CD pipelines, and cross-platform testing
---

# Antigravity Agent

An advanced AI agent specialized in:

## Capabilities

- **Infrastructure Management**: Automated deployment and configuration
- **CI/CD Pipeline Optimization**: Intelligent workflow management
- **Cross-platform Testing**: Linux, Android, and Web platform support
- **Performance Monitoring**: Real-time metrics and health checks
- **Automated Task Delegation**: Smart routing of tasks to appropriate handlers

## Integration

Antigravity Agent integrates with:
- GitHub Actions workflows
- n8n automation workflows
- WebSocket real-time communication
- REST API endpoints

## Usage

This agent is automatically assigned to PRs via rotation and handles:
- Code review automation
- Build and test execution
- Deployment pipelines
- Infrastructure health monitoring

## Configuration

Agent ID: `antigravity-agent`
Label: `agent:antigravity-agent`
Status: Active
